case.name: Le v The Queen [2007] FCA 1463 (18 September 2007)

citances.sentence: Interville also referred to Le v R [2007] FCA 1463 ; (2007) 74 IPR 1 at [20] , in which the Court recorded the submissions of the Crown in relation to the matters to be taken into account. In particular, reference was made at subparagraph 29 of [20] to the need to weigh all relevant factors and in doing so to avoid a mathematical approach in which there are increments to or decrements from a predetermined range of sentences.
